method.name: HideIcon
method.comment: Icone Barnamto Be Sabke Zir Hide Kon To Main Ejrash Kon Age bade ejraye in az app beri birun nabandi dg nemituni be Activity Mainet bargardi vali Activity haye dg ro mituni ejra koni age goftam beri buirun main ro nabandi un to posht dar hale ejra mimune pas behrtare ke az sharesh khalas shi :D omidvaram fahmide bashi Ex : Dim hadi As Hide Dim r As Reflector hadi.HideIcon(r.GetActivity,r.GetActivity) c: a:

method.name: ShowIcon
method.comment: Icone Barnamato Be Sabke Zir Show Kon Ex : Dim hadi As Hide Dim r As Reflector hadi.ShowIcon(r.GetContext, "chandresane.com.MyApp") c: pkgName: : esme packeshete
